column4: hi guys. I'm having a bit of a problem with compiz fusion. My windows constantly dissapear behind the top panel. How can I change this behavour?
kenbw2, no some apps when they open, like firefox don't respect the top panel and is partialy covered by it
kenbw2, no when I maximize the windows, everything is fine. Just when I start firefox it isn't fine.
just press alt+F2 then write ...   compiz --replace
